com.whirvis.jraknet.session

Class SplitPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.session.SplitPacket

  • public class SplitPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to easily assemble split packets received from a RakNetSession.
    Author:
    Whirvis T. Wheatley

        Returns:

      • update

        public Packet update(EncapsulatedPacket encapsulated)
        Updates the data for the split packet while also verifying that the specified EncapsulatedPacket belongs to this split packet.
        Parameters:
        encapsulated - the EncapsulatedPacket being used to update the data.
        Returns:
        the packet if finished, null if data is still missing.

      • needsSplit

        public static boolean needsSplit(Reliability reliability,
                                 Packet packet,
                                 int maximumTransferUnit)
        Parameters:
        reliability - the reliability of the packet.
        packet - the packet.
        maximumTransferUnit - the maximum transfer unit of the session.
        Returns:
        true the packet needs to be split.

      • splitPacket

        public static final EncapsulatedPacket[] splitPacket(RakNetSession session,
                                                     EncapsulatedPacket encapsulated)
        Splits the specified EncapsulatedPacket using the specified maximumTransferUnit
        Parameters:
        session - the session.
        encapsulated - the EncapsulatedPacket to split.
        Returns:
        the split EncapsulatedPackets.
